description.ko: 완벽한 질서가 필연적인 오류를 만나는 곳, 디지털 공허 속 기하학의 침묵하는 투쟁.
description.en: Where perfect order meets the inevitable glitch, a silent struggle of geometry in a digital void.

prompt: An infinite architectural staircase of liquid-chrome geometric cubes melting into a vast sea of monochrome digital static and horizontal scanline ripples. The composition uses high-contrast monochrome complexity with sharp obsidian angles clashing against soft white digital noise. 8k, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on shifting mirror surfaces. Global illumination highlights the glitch art aesthetics where order dissolves into chaotic fragments. Dramatic shadows emphasize the depth of the recursive geometric structure, with a focus on the razor-sharp edges of the fracturing monoliths.
